page.title: 08WEST COKER AREA LIFE STYLES
page.content: {FOUR ACRES HOTEL. THE FOUR ACRES HOTEL IN WEST COKER GETS ITS NAME FROM THE AREA OF GROUNDS. IT HAS LOTS OF CAR PARKS AND CAN TAKE 50_60 CARS EASILY. IT IS A TWO STAR HOTEL BUT THEY ARE HOPING SOON TO MAKE IT A THREE STAR. THEY HAVE A SWIMMING POOL,CHILDRENS PLAY AREA,AND GAMES ROOM. IT IS Â£28.50 PER NIGHT FOR A SINGLE BEDROOM WHICH INCLUDES BREAKFAST AND AN EVENING MEAL,OR Â£35.OO FOR A DOUBLE BEDROOM OR Â£42.00 TO Â£45.00 FOR LUXURY DOUBLE BEDROOMS. ON AVERAGE 20 PEOPLE, MAINLY BUISNESS PEOPLE CONNECTED TO WESTLANDS, STAY PER NIGHT.MOST STAY FOR ONE NIGHT BUT THEY DO HAVE SOME LONGER STAY GUESTS. THE HOTEL HAS MANY WEDDING RECEPTIONS DURING THE SUMMER. THEY EMPLOY 24 PEOPLE,MAINLY PART TIME
